articles.author: Alex Hern
articles.title: Zuckerberg's Meta to lay off another 10000 employees - The Guardian
articles.description: Restructuring, as part of the company’s ‘Year of Efficiency’, also sees 5,000 unfulfilled job adverts closed
articles.content: Mark Zuckerbergs Meta is laying off another 10,000 people and instituting a further hiring freeze as part of the companys Year of Efficiency, the chief executive announced in a Facebook post on Tuesd… [+4119 chars]
